body.p: James A Ransom was convicted of trying to pass Counterfeit money in July last. I did not defend him. I heard the Testimoney and thought the Jury should have found him not guilty -- because he was evidently entrapped into the offense -- I know him, he is undoubtedly incapable of a plan for such a purpose -- besides the Conduct of the officers, was such in my Judgment to have destroyed the prosecution -- I seldom interfere in such matters but of Governor, I well know his mother a hardworking and needs his assistance --
